lender.name: Paul and Cara
lender.loan_because: It seems like such a small amount can make such a huge difference for someone else. Instead of a "hand out" these people just need a little help to make their own success.
lender.occupational_info: A non-profit director and a manager in the software industry.

lender.name: Jorge
lender.loan_because: we all should care for one another. We are all connected. There is a lot of suffering in our beautiful little blue planet, so many families with so little to go on. They all need our help. I am happy with my simple life and would like everyone to have a chance at happiness too.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems as a database administrator. My daily responsibility is to maintain several databases and make sure they are all working properly so customers are satisfied.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: It seems like a wonderful way to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying law at UCLA.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping people. Certainly in my life people have been extraordinairly kind to me and supportive of me. I believe in passing it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange trips...everything from airline tickets within the U.S. to cruises, tours, adventure travel, dive trips...if you can dream it I can arrange it for you! I am a dream merchant, and that makes me very happy.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I know that a helping hand is better than a handout more often than not.
lender.occupational_info: I hope to become an educator once I've finished school.

lender.name: Walter
lender.occupational_info: Social Entrepreneur

lender.name: Masato
lender.loan_because: i believe anybody with the will and passion to take charge of their lives deserves a chance

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want others in the world to have opportunities as well.

lender.name: Alden
lender.loan_because: Others need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I studied Economics and International Relations with a focus on developing economies at UC Davis.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I feel that giving others the ability to make capital upgrades to make their businesses more efficient and profitable, to allow them to purchase additional supplies to continue to grow their business, or help them to start new businesses will help their communities more than just regular aid programs.

lender.name: Abram
lender.loan_because: I think microloans are a great opportunity to reach out and help a global community help itself
lender.occupational_info: I work in computer chip Test research and development. I look out in time 6-8 years and try and decipher what high-volume manufacturing Test solutions we'll need.

lender.name: Boo
lender.loan_because:
I loan because it is a correct use for my wealth.
PS: it is my kiddo that actually decides on the loans :-)
lender.occupational_info: For my real job I drive an ambulance, and provide emergency medical care. As a student I study painting and printmaking.

lender.name: kathy dlz
lender.loan_because: a small thing can make a big difference (:

lender.name: Jason Fung
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is the best SUSTAINABLE way I know of to help people around the world.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.occupational_info: I work with the courts doing a lot of data entry with computers, filing, and answering questions over the phone.

lender.name: Evelin & Danny
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to help someone else just by sitting at your computer. Why not show some gratitude for what we have and pass a small part on to someone else in need.
lender.occupational_info: We help people improve their physical and emotional wellbeing in a natural way, anything from bruises, coughs, infections to anxiety, depression or Autism.

lender.name: vivian
lender.loan_because: I am hoping to be able to make a difference to somebody's live, prescribing to Kiva loans is my feel good moment of a day, at least i will have made somebody happy ...
lender.occupational_info: working as project manager for computer applications for big corporation

lender.name: John and CB
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed us with loving families, friends, education, and many opportunities to pursue our passions. His Son Jesus Christ has commanded us to care for those in need. To this end, we seek to use our resources as tools to love and help others. Through microlending we hope to bless others just as we have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: John works in management consulting focusing on business strategy. CB is a full-time student pursuing a Master's in Environmental Management. They currently live in Singapore.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like to help people
lender.occupational_info: I work in training and education

lender.name: Era Tech.net
lender.loan_because: We believe in empowering the less fortunate ones in order to help and assist with their business needs.
lender.occupational_info: We are a web solutions company and encourage to volunteer to spread goodwill around the world.

lender.name: Chris and family
lender.loan_because: my family and I wish to help others

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I didn't know there was anything like this out there,,, and it's such a good idea. Hopefully I can help someone achieve their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a TV News Producer.

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have dreams
lender.occupational_info: I help children who don't speak and read well and in writing difficulties.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I care about people who live outside my own country.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer all day at a small bank called a credit union. I have an office with no window and I miss the sunshine.

lender.name: Vaniah
lender.loan_because: it makes sense

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I hope to help empower people to succeed and to glorify God. "Whatever you do, do for the glory of God"
lender.occupational_info: Married with 2 kids

lender.name: John R. Bryan
lender.loan_because: Loan inspire trust. Gifts inspire dependencies.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to take an active role in helping the developing world, especially the Middle East and Central Asia.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Virginia.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I think it's important that we all do what we can to help our fellow human beings. If I have the means to help, then I have a moral obligation to do just that. Microfinancing feels more personal than simply donating to a charity (esp. if you don't know where that money is going).
lender.occupational_info: My work involves data analysis and spreadsheet and database design. It's not particularly satisfying, but it pays the bills.

lender.name: Adriana
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Dagmar
lender.loan_because: ...denn die Freude, die wir geben, kehrt ins eig'ne Herz zurck.

lender.name: Thuan
lender.loan_because: I'd like to support women's economic empowerment movement.
lender.occupational_info: Promoting Women's Economic Empowerment.

lender.name: nodeposit
lender.loan_because: Get your biggest prizes only here!

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I know I am helping someone help themselves. It's not charity; it's a helping hand. And I get a huge kick out of it in general :)
lender.occupational_info: Filing, copying, taking phone calls...pretty basic stuff.

lender.name: Deeba Hargis
lender.loan_because: Love, Greatness, and Prosperity Abounds! Abundance flows into my network group, Higher Purpose Business Network, The Greatness Foundation, OfficeOnTheInternet.com, and my company, EXCEL-WEST.com.
lender.occupational_info:
Love, Greatness and Prosperity
project management tools, project scheduling, web project management, software development management, web based crm, risk management software, project management program, managing projects, task management software, vision engineering, software design website design 2.0, social network engineering, trend spotting, to name a few.

lender.name: Samantha, Mikey, & Nicky
lender.occupational_info: Samantha, Mikey, and Nicky are siblings who were born and raised in the suburbs of New York. Samantha (the eldest) is a graduate of the University of Pennsylvania and is currently working for Microsoft in Seattle, Washington. Mikey (the middle child) is a student at Georgetown University. Nicky (the youngest) is a student at Fordham University.

lender.name: Rob
lender.occupational_info: I assist clients in leasing, buying, and selling property all across New York City.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: people who want to work to make their lives and the world better deserve a chance to do so

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: People around the world should have a chance to better their lives.

lender.name: Thomas and Christine
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach History to 13 year olds in a poor neighborhood.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: I believe that a small gesture can change a person's live.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I wish to lend a hand where few others will reach.
lender.occupational_info: Ex army officer and Financier, Entrepreneur, Wine provider, export and import, (all cover stories for my spy business 007.5)

lender.name: Nathalia
lender.loan_because: I've experienced in different occasions the powerful impact of the teaching or the kindness of strangers. Over the years, they have helped me help myself. I personally believe in paying forward, especially in gift that keeps on giving in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: denise
lender.loan_because: I can, and I want to try and do my part and help others

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others achieve their goals and dreams. Even a small gesture can make a huge impact!

lender.name: Bill Scaife
lender.loan_because: Because the wealth of our world is distributed unevenly. Because of Gospel passage: "Whoever does this for the least of these, does it for me also."

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in life and am grateful. I loan because I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of people who prepare papwerwork for loans to businesses of all sizes.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I care! I would like to have the courage to start my own business; in the meantime, I would like to help others who have taken that leap.
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing for a small software company based in Philadelphia. I develop campaigns that our customers can use within their organizations to drive usage of the software. I also build initiatives to encourage clients to buy more from us.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: credit (and savings!) used with conscious awareness creates growth and development for one's self and one's community.
lender.occupational_info: I educate and advise people, whether they have lots of money or very little, about the rules of money so they can take care of themselves, their families and their communities. My focus is on lending people money to purchase a home in the U.S. There are many financial advantages to home ownership in the U.S. And owning one's home is a powerful experience that empowers people to build their lives and the lives of those around them. But, it starts with a commitment to financial education whether you ever own a home or not.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to do this; how can I not?
lender.occupational_info: I create packaging designs and text for a natural health care products manufacturer.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Somebody loaned to me.
lender.occupational_info: I make complicated work simple and help big groups of strangers work together.

lender.name: Kate & Jimmy
lender.loan_because: God blesses us in many ways so we want to share with others how gracious God is with us.
lender.occupational_info: We are wine brokers / we sell the wine for wineries Kate is a VP of a software company

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a great way to help people get a start with a new business endeavor or grow an existing business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a video/media Producer doing mostly corporate video. I do non profit productions whenever possible. If you have a non profit Video Production project you would like to discuss. Please contact me.

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: Helping feels good.

lender.name: mary synn
lender.loan_because: I am currently a housewife who wanted to start a business.
lender.occupational_info: I cook good food and sell them

lender.name: Jospeh
lender.loan_because: It is my belief that the next step in the human species is the need for us to stop thinking in terms of countries and to start thinking of ourselves as one as we work towards a joined world, where everyone is truly given a chance to be equal
lender.occupational_info: As of right now im a student at Northeastern University in Boston. Upon graduation I plan on working for a global consulting firm, helping in the unification of the world

lender.name: Payvand
lender.loan_because: it is an absolute privilege to help create opportunities for capable, hardworking, and strong willed people, and exciting to be part of the ripple effect.
lender.occupational_info: Trained as an educator, now plan to help build/improve education systems.

lender.name: Catarina
lender.loan_because: I'm one among the fortunate that can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with GIS in Fisheries Management - generally everything related to fisheries that can end up on a map.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: Not everyone is as fortunate as we are. KIVA helps to spread the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles for a magazine and review books, audio books and DVDs. I am also a second hand bookseller on the internet.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because:
Since there is such an inequality in the distribution of the world's resources, I want to do my part to level the playing field.
The Bible is very clear about caring for the poor, oppressed, and needy. This is one way to give the voiceless a way to raise their voice and be empowered.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: it makes so much sense

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying medicine.

lender.name: Sharil
lender.loan_because: I lend because I believe in African solutions to African problems.

lender.name: Lyly
lender.loan_because: it feels right in a world with a lot of wrongs....

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in sixth grade. I am a musician-- I play the violin and trumpet and sing.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I worked at the patent office for 3 years (lots of mindless paperwork for the government arguing with lawyers and Japanese tech corporations). I am currently wandering around the world.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I can help so many people.
lender.occupational_info: I read for hours on end. Favourite books include The Underland Chronicles, Alex Rider, The Inheritance Cycle, Warriors, and Harry Potter.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Dutchy
lender.loan_because: Everybody should have the same opportunity to improve their lifestyle,regardless of their geographical location or culture.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, and live not a rich life,but comfortable, and if I can share some of the spoils from my life's work to make someone else's life more comfortable, than I have not wasted my life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help out others in some way. I don't have much but this is an opportunity for me to do something to help others in the world.

lender.name: matteo
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Franklyn
lender.loan_because: I don't have much money, but I have enough to loan someone $25!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Lending a hand is so much more effective than giving a hand-out. Besides, it's just fun to invest in a small business, then watch it grow!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the lives of people who are less fortunate than I am.

lender.name: Ruston
lender.loan_because: Keeps me in check
lender.occupational_info: ...computers go boom, i bring a wrench.

lender.name: Money to Get Home Jar
lender.loan_because: It's what I do best.
lender.occupational_info: I started as a change receptacle in the lovely Freshman residence of Matt Gelfand and Jake Johnson, and eventually discovered my life's mission: turning people's spare change into contributions to worthy causes.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: The best way to form a stable government is to have prosperous citizens.
lender.occupational_info: I respond to all types of emergencies, from fires to medical incidents, and from natural disasters to man-made crises.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: It takes power away from 'The Man' and puts it in the hands of sensible people who believe in a better future for our world.
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect children from abuse and neglect.

lender.name: Marguerite
lender.loan_because: like many of these people, I too needed a helping hand many times in my life. If I can help at least one person succeed in taking care of themselves and others I am grateful!
lender.occupational_info: I am a multi passionate Entreprenuer who's primary passion is helping people accomplish the dream of homeownership!

lender.name: Anthea
lender.loan_because: I want to help others create a better life for themselves, their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business looking after peoples gardens in Victoria BC Canada.

lender.name: Shawn & Olya
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to other countries and met many wonderful people who are hard working and very appreciative of any help they receive. I know the money loaned will be used wisely, and provides an opportunity to make positive impacts economically for their family, community, & country.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Safety and Occupational Health Director for a U.S. Agency that conducts research and development on infectious diseases. Olya recently immigrated to the United States and is pursuing her American Dream.

lender.name: Mandi
lender.loan_because: It's an effective way to help people. Better than just throwing money at them.
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to school to be a Social Worker.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful feeling to know I can help people in many parts of the world through this wonderful organization. I can't imagine anyone hearing about Kiva and not immediately joining the crusade to make the world better for us ALL.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student. I'm training to become a psychologist.

lender.name: Kaye
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Chinese proverb "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime" and I think it's a wonderful opportunity to support people who are trying to improve their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Mike and Tasha
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe deeply in helping others.

lender.name: Yoko
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the way to fight with poverty.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to research and publish the voice of women in Tanzania. I will continue on researching mothers and babies in developing countries.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Liezl Buenaventura
lender.loan_because: wealth should be shared, not hoarded.
lender.occupational_info: I do graphic and web design for a local cosmetics company that uses only organic materials. They purchase these organic crops exclusively from local farmers in order to boost the economy and help the country thrive.

lender.name: MImi
lender.loan_because: Consideration for others is like investing in pennies and getting dollars back.
lender.occupational_info: The learning never stops - for the teacher and student.

lender.name: A & F
lender.loan_because: Together, we can make a better world!

lender.name: Kazue
lender.loan_because: I had been working with something securities market related which is frenzied, seems to be somewhat spun off from actual life's economy. I wanted to recontribute money into meaningful, tangible and something I want to commit.

lender.name: Casino
lender.occupational_info: Play all kinds of casino games for free!

lender.name: Evan
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional programmer who is bound to my bed with a laptop from 2001. I can code in PHP, C++, Javascript, Ajax, MySQL pretty much anything i read, i can understand.

lender.name: Jamil
lender.loan_because: it's a win win situation.
lender.occupational_info: I help solve problems to keep people, business and technology running

lender.name: JIH
lender.loan_because:
I've read a lot of stuff about how the way in which we (the West) have traditionally given foreign aid has not always worked out. So, I thought I'd contribute to something constructive.
This microloan stuff is a great alternative. It helps people out to do their own thing. As opposed to us telling them what to do!
lender.occupational_info: Student , community welfare worker volunteer, idiot sports fan (football, NFL, Ice Hockey)

lender.name: Rishi Tiwari
lender.loan_because: i like to help honest hard working people who choose to work for their betterment despite their limited resources.
lender.occupational_info: It is a job where you come across huge amount of money everyday but which does not belongs to you. You are a custodian of it and honesty and hard work has to be your nature.

lender.name: Daniella
lender.loan_because: I love people.

lender.name: A small paw
lender.loan_because: I have a comfy life and think the world needs as much balance as it can get, I know microfinance won't solve world poverty but if I can make a small paw of difference that's great!
lender.occupational_info: I'd rather be travelling the world...

lender.name: Ewoud
lender.loan_because: It works.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: The world is too small of a place to ignore your neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and I am in the US military. I want to transform our military from the inside out with a different perspective on the world.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: Opportunity is the beginning of achievment
lender.occupational_info: I serve teenagers in a high school library.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I care about the World and to give hope to underprivileged people who are trying to improve their situation while improving the economies in their local communities.

lender.name: Rohan
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with good fortune and believe it is important for all of us to share our wealth with each other.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed--and this is a way that I can make a small difference for someone else.

lender.name: abadrivera
lender.loan_because: i believe in investing in people and their potential to be successful in their own way.
lender.occupational_info: i want to make design and architecture truly relevant in our society. one of the ways we can do that is by taking on projects that can positively impact people and their communities. my current project focuses on researching the lahar-ravaged town of Bacolor, Pampanga in the Philippines and developing a series of architectural design strategies to assist in its full recovery and preservation of its architectural legacy. in doing so, i am hoping to also help preserve the communities and their collective memories.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: decky
lender.loan_because: staf goverment with less salary and i'm try to learn internet bussines, so far is to dificult find god site... to much scam. So I thing ... internet is the god way who can make bussines online, and I try..

lender.name: jose
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good i like helping others and know that i can make a diffrence in the world
lender.occupational_info: well what i do is fly airplanes with a teacher (instructor) and he teaches me how to fly the airplane but not for nothing it goes by licenses there is three main licenses a private a intrument and a commercial licenses im working on the second licenses my intrument im short of being done i hope

lender.name: Heidi Jury
lender.occupation: Musician and Works at a Charity
lender.loan_because: I believe that using business to save the world rather than destroy it makes sense intellectually and spiritually
lender.occupational_info: My work as a musician is to bring together communities. Working at a charity that helps children across the world helps me to bring together the world. www.chalice.ca

lender.name: Houssein
lender.loan_because: My first reason for loaning is that I wanted to do it on behalf of my wife and my 2 daughters. My second reason is that, as a head of household, it is my duty to help when I can and wherever I can. My third reason is that I am Lebanese and I was born in Senegal where the Djiito family is from. May God bless all of you, helpers and receivers.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Pharmacy Hospital. My shift is a 10 hour day four times a week. I supervise the work flow and the work of 2 to 3 pharmacy technicians. I also make sure that disease /medication treatment is appropriate and that all medications doses and frequencies are correct all throughout my shift. I mix antibiotics and Chemo therapy agents for all appropriate patients. I also assist the nurses and the physicians in some ambiguities that may occur during their shift to facilitate their demandes that are directly connected to the Pharmacy and their patients. I also fill prescriptions for free for home use to the indigen families that cannot afford to pay. And many more.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I have a little to share.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick people in a hospital.

lender.name: Ines
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do - it makes me feel good. There are a lot of people who weren't as lucky and I want to help them. Plus, I'm human - that's what we're supposed to do.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Need to purchase office equipement like a computer and printer, table , phone and chair. I also need a USED van for supply distribution.
lender.occupational_info: I am a GENERAL CONTRACTOR, who supplies office products, construction, maintenance projects and professional services to the Government and the private sector.

lender.name: Saloni
lender.loan_because:
As a high school (now college!!) student, I contribute to Kiva to help woman attain financial stability in developing countries. I also use the principles of economics to spread the risk of my lending portfolio. Using the profits from my own non-profit handicraft business and occasional birthday gifts, I have helped 246 women thus far. I focus on women with low socioeconomic status and need less than a $1000 loan. I lend the repaid money to other entrepreneurs, creating a perpetual cycle of giving and receiving. As a Kiva Intern, I'm helping to expand the Kiva High School program!
Highlights of my Kiva portfolio 100% of loans to women Does not fund loans that promote gambling or alcoholism 246 loans funded in 26 countries Smaller amount for each loan to spread the risk and help more women Favors Kiva MFIs with a 4 or 5 star rating to minimize the risk of defaulted loans Focus on entrepreneurs from countries with low per capita income Focuses on loans funded in countries with less than 5,000 USD per capita income Most of my loans on Kiva request less than 1,000 USD
Updated 3/19/12!
Feel free to check out:
The blog post Kiva wrote about me! http://www.kiva.org/blog/2010/03/25/lender-profile-young-lender-making.html
My blog on economics: www.misseconomist.blogspot.com
My business of handmade memory boards from which profits go directly to my KIva account: www.cherishbysaloni.webs.com
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a student who has much more to learn :)

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe that with a little bit of help, so much can be accomplished. I believe that if you can help someone develop the tools they need, they can become self-sufficient for the rest of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I represent individuals and companies who are in disputes with another party

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Political Science

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
When I saw Hassan's profile, I was intrigued by the idea of a Jewish woodworker in the USA helping a woodworker in Lebanon to equip his shop. We are half way around the globe from one another, yet we share so much in common.
In this picture, I am standing in front of a case that I built for my synagogue, to hold an antique wedding canopy.
Good luck, Hassan!
lender.occupational_info: We make wood-veneered panels to be used by other woodworkers for homes and businesses.

lender.name: Fabio
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like needing money to grow your business. It can be a very difficult struggle. When I am able, I will help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have two businesses. One does mainly garden work. The other recycles old mattresses.

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: but not nearly as hard as any of the people Kiva helps

lender.name: Aislinn
lender.loan_because: I want to help. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I manage human resources and payroll functions.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to help women empower themselves! And it makes me feel happy inside.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Information Systems department of a major insurance company.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: Just my little way of sharing the love of God with people around the world.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I originally received a Kiva gift certificate from my sister for Christmas, but now I think I will spread this from her to my friends to help all of these businesses thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I create advertising for a telecommunication company (TV/Internet/Phone).

lender.name: Heal Our World Project
lender.whereabouts: First Unitarian Church of Victoria BC
lender.loan_because: Each year the First Unitarian Church of Victoria chooses and funds one or two projects to help heal our world. One of the H.O.W 2009 projects is to fund 100 micro loans to women. Through the generosity of our congregation we raised enough money for 138 loans! Want more information? unitarianflames@shaw.ca
lender.occupational_info: Unitarians believe we are all part of an interconnected web of life so reaching out to help others will help us all.

lender.name: Berta
lender.loan_because: Micro loans are an important way to help people.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me a Kiva gift certificate as a birthday present! What a great gift! I'm excited to watch this business grow. I chose Abdugufron Kalandarov to lend to because I love to see cultural crafts that are passed down through generations flourish.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist working in etched glass, watercolor, oil pastel and collage. I also teach art part time and in the winter season ski patrol part time.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I want entrepreneurs to have the same opportunities as me. I want to ease the grasp poverty has on third world countries and let them feel the joy and beauty the world has to offer.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: the greatest kindness one can show another is to give them the chance to live with dignity and respect

lender.name: Coral
lender.loan_because: Giving is good for the soul. Glad to help. Many Blessing to all of you
lender.occupational_info: I farm organic annual , vegetable, herb and perennial seeds to sell on our world wide on our website and at the Seedy Saturday shows in Southern British Columbia. Go to our site...you'll see

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: To help others achieve their goals.

lender.name: Q Benedikt
lender.loan_because: hopefully I can make a distance
lender.occupational_info: I teach as a substitute teacher, tutor students, and do assorted little jobs while I work to find a new job in the sciences

lender.name: J.L
lender.loan_because: i like the warm fuzzy feeling and want to be part of this community of people.

lender.name: Alex S. Lynch
lender.loan_because: Americans are too blessed not to share the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I design mechanical things for a solar energy company.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: if you give a man to fish you feed him for a day, but if you TEACH a man to fish... This program is all about empowering individuals to improve their own lives through hard work and responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full time student working on my masters degree. I also am involved in several part time positions (coaching, teaching, tutoring, front desk at a hotel, and construction on my days off... =) each of which I have chosen to be involved in for a specific reason that usually has something to do with being beneficial to my future plans or just for the enjoyment of the activity.

lender.name: Dori
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate for the things I have in my life. I have more than I could ever need and want to help people across the world to help make it a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I sell employee benefits to insurance brokers. I wholesale Life, Disability and Dental insurance for businesses.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I like helping people all over the world since we are all one family.
lender.occupational_info: I update internet pages and send email marketing campaigns for a large company in Canada. When I am not working I like to ride my horse, garden, write, travel, and spend time with friends.

lender.name: Leah and Nick
lender.loan_because: we care!

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I want to share my resources. I want to give a leg up to folks fulfilling their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Occupational therapists help people achieve greater levels of independence, physically, emotionally, educationally. Micro loaning fells like an extension of my professional life. It feels right!

lender.name: Keegan
lender.loan_because: lazerkatz

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Maintain the community college's computer network.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: It is important to reach out to others and show the love of Jesus in small ways. It is good to see directly how our dollars go to help specific people.
lender.occupational_info: I make boring things pretty. I use a computer to create art and messages that sell products for our clients. We use photos, video and visual design to help people understand better.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Pastor of Spiritual Development at Calvary Church in Charlotte.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I have more material things than many others do. People were generous to me when I needed help. It is my turn to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer in a small town where I help people with a variety of legal issues.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: A micro-loan sum can help someone attain a steady income for a long time. Given the repayment rate, the amount that actually goes to the recipient and not to a company middleman, and the ease of the transaction means it's not hard to see this is a great idea. Go Kiva!

lender.name: Pale Blue Dot
lender.loan_because: I have a need to do good things to make it beautiful to live.

lender.name: Stephen & Elyse Bealer
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus
lender.occupational_info: Helping people invest money for the future

lender.name: Team Estrella
lender.loan_because: like Ghandi said I am trying to be the change I want to see in the world.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed with a wonderful job and hope to help others in whatever way I can.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want enable self reliance and further educational opportunities.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I think it will make a difference in someone's life. Everyone that's capable should help someone less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a local government protecting people and property from fire. I also provide emergency medical services.

lender.name: Tony Bacigalupo
lender.loan_because: I love helping people work for themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I run a community space for people who work from home to come together and do their work in a social environment

lender.name: MrBrewmans.com
lender.loan_because: I think it's a pretty neat idea!
lender.occupational_info: I package a mixture of Teas and other ingredients to mail out to people so that they can enjoy "Southern Style" Sweetened Tea at home.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...
lender.occupational_info: I consult for the greater good

lender.name: Nate
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Financial Management Department of the US Naval Undersea Warfare Center.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: in a small way with the help of others we really can make a difference.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to reach out.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Today, give a stranger one of your smiles. It might be the only sunshine he sees all day.
lender.occupational_info: College student

lender.name: Josh & Rosemary
lender.loan_because: We have a heart for other cultures. We love to see microfinance in action, helping hard-working people take care of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We own and run a website that promotes independent restaurants in the United States, also giving restauranteurs a place to connect and collaborate (getondining.com). We also have a food blog where we include reviews on favorite independent restaurants in our area.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: Investing in businesses is even BETTER than charity. We have so much wealth in the USA, we must share it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a published author, working on my 2nd book.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Nashay
lender.loan_because: What is so little to us means so much more to others.
lender.occupational_info: Phd student....

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: Every country deserves to have entrepreneurship encouraged. My travels in the military took me to many places, and I always felt that with a chance, big thinkers anywhere can succeed, not just in the USA.
lender.occupational_info: I start wind turbine generators for the first time. My efforts have saved the world from millions of tons of greenhouse gases.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Its a great feeling to know I am making a difference and helping someone improve their lot in life. Even the smallest effort contributes to a mighty goal.

lender.name: Sanjay Beri
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in need - and I think helping those who have the entrepreneurial spirit and passion to make their lives and those around them better is a great way

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and networking of various types of systems.

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because: those who can, should, and Kiva is the right environment to do that in.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team designing and building advertising and website for the internet. I mainly do work for financial services and charity clients.

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: Tahir
lender.loan_because: Access to Capital can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I help people take the steps that reduce their taxes

lender.name: Dr. Sheila McKenzie
lender.loan_because: CARING. SHARING. EDUCATION. PEACE.
lender.occupational_info: Public Health Diplomat and Doctor of Humanitarian Medicine with WONM-Clinics for Humanity Programs in local and international communities, yearly as Deputy Minister for Politics of Protection of Family and International Community under the International parliament for Safety and Peace (IPSP).

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I believe that many people just need that little bit of help to stand on their own feet.

lender.name: WFPF
lender.loan_because: It is our goal to be useful in society
lender.occupational_info: Exhilarating!

lender.name: Sol
lender.loan_because: micro lending is a great program to build confidence and finance for our borrowers!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a banker.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: as a small business owner myself I love to give people the opportunity to be able to work for themselves thus making it easier to earn a living, be self sufficient and be able to support their family.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Unprecedented Poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Gang Researcher in Los Angeles. I research reasons behind the poverty and crime in Gang infested areas of Los Angeles.

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: I work on making computers more secure and reliable, so technology can me more useful to people.

lender.name: jim
lender.occupation: dir not for profit- SAFE -Sports for Kids Spec Ne

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: Trying to do just a little good and give someone a pull up.

lender.name: Daniel A.
lender.loan_because: I believe in outreach, I believe in the people who are asking for loans to improve their lives when governments fail them.
lender.occupational_info: As a poet and conservationist, I want to help you reach your full potential, for you and your families. I would like you to grow your "green" mind along with your creativity.
